CustomField.formula: IF( AND( (Forecasted_Logical_Decommission_Date__c - TODAY()) > 180 , (Forecasted_Logical_Decommission_Date__c - TODAY()) < 240), TRUE, FALSE)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Box is checked if the forecasted RF Shutdown date is less than 240 days away and more than 180 days away. Warns that a site is approaching RF Date Lockdown.
CustomField.label: 180 Day RF Shutdown Warning
